page.title: 12Village Events - July 1985
page.content: One of the things that happened last week was the{village fete,}where there were toys to buy,{stalls}to win prizes on, and{games}to play. There were also {strawberry teas}served by the Brownies. Just lately a{new landlord}has moved into the pub called The Eagles. Over the past year there has been {building}in Oak Meadow, and it is possible that there might be building on the field north of the vicarage. At school we have had{sports days and we are looking forward to the{six {week summer holiday}which begins in two weeks time. There will be twelve{pupils leaving}the school soon and{transferring}to secondary school. We have had a{Comfirmation Ceremony recently at the Church, and in September our village{vicar is {retiring.
